name: Marblelous
overview: Marblelous is an action puzzler where you guide a ball to the exit of a level while collecting special items on the way. You don't control the ball directly, but through placing arrows on the ground that cause the ball to change direction. You lose a life if the ball collides with a wall or any obstacle. The game offers 100 levels in total and on some of them you can save your progress using a password system.
